org.activiti.engine.delegate.event

Interface ActivitiEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseEntityEventListener

    public interface ActivitiEventListener
    Describes a class that listens for ActivitiEvents dispatched by the engine.
    Author:
    Frederik Heremans

        boolean isFailOnException()
